meanings.definition: A type of fish with a distinctive three-lobed tail.
meanings.sent1: I saw a school of tripletails swimming gracefully in the ocean.
meanings.sent2: The tripletails in the aquarium displayed their unique tails to the visitors.
meanings.sent3: The tripletails decided to have a tail-wagging competition for fun.
meanings.sent4: The tripletails' tails shimmered like jewels under the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The tripletails' three-lobed tails make them easy to identify.

meanings.definition: The plural form of the word 'tripletail', referring to multiple fish of this species.
meanings.sent1: The fishermen caught a large haul of tripletails to sell at the market.
meanings.sent2: The tripletails swam together in a synchronized pattern, creating a mesmerizing sight.
meanings.sent3: At the fish party, the tripletails were the life of the ocean.
meanings.sent4: The ocean was filled with a sea of tripletails, a true spectacle of nature.
meanings.sent5: The tripletails' abundance in the waters brought joy to the fishermen.
